page.title: 10Pastimes
page.content: The favourite hobbies of p6/7 area: football 7 votes, swimming 5, horse riding 2, dancing, drawing, stamp collecting, sports, eating, netball and hill walking 1 each. The big park in Fordoun has a big slide, roundabout, swings and a football pitch. It is mainly used for football. Fordoun FC play there in the summer. The little park has 3 climbing frames, swins and a slide. It also has bouncy animals. It is handy for the Fordoun children as it is in the middle of Fordoun. Ap6/7 class survey showed favourite items were as follows: swings 7 votes, chute 5 votes, roundabout 2 votes, climbing frame 1 vote.
